text: You take a peek above your monitor to ask Tristan, but he doesn't seem to either see or hear you.

title: Walked Over to Tristan's Desk
text: You walk over to Tristan's desk and pick your finger on his shoulder to get his attention. He quickly closes down what he had up on his computer. The only thing you managed to spot was the name Kurwenal and a cat. Tristan looks at you, annoyed, but he answers your question. You continue to work. You're curious though. What exactly is 'Kurwenal'?

title: Investigated Further
text: You try to investigate it further, but the files about it on Merkeware's servers seem to be locked.

title: Eh Whatever. It's probably nothing important.
text: You finish the extremely boring internship and graduate university. You didn't really learn a lot, because Merkeware's code was terribly build, but you did earn a new enemy: Tristan. You're certain you will despise that man for the rest of your life.

title: What is 'Kurwenal'?
text: Tristan tells you to not worry about it. Your work day is now over.

title: The Next Day
text: You are sad becaues of your dog that died  the other day. You had forgotten to register Melot as a pet, and as a punishment, Merkeware Inc. killed him. That's at least what you think. That's what Merkeware does to those who don't obey.

title: Time To Do My Work!
